data.title: Professional Pilot - Unmanned Aircraft Systems
data.text:
This is a suggested schedule for a student who has completed any developmental course work and has no transfer credits. Refer to the College catalog for specific requirements in selecting General Education Courses.

AVMT 101 - Aviation History and Development 3 Credit(s).

AVMT 131 - Private Pilot Ground School 3 Credit(s).

MATH 125 - Finite Mathematics and Modeling 3 Credit(s).

ENGL 101 - College Composition I 3 Credit(s).

Program Elective 2-3 Credit(s).

This is a suggested schedule for a student who has completed any developmental course work and has no transfer credits. Refer to the College catalog for specific requirements in selecting General Education Courses.

AVMT 161 - Unmanned Aircraft Systems Operations 3 Credit(s).

AVMT 162 - Unmanned Aircraft Systems Flight Training 3 Credit(s).

Gen. Ed. Elective - Information Technology 3 Credit(s).

Program Elective 2-3 Credit(s).

This is a suggested schedule for a student who has completed any developmental course work and has no transfer credits. Refer to the College catalog for specific requirements in selecting General Education Courses.

AVMT 211 - Air Transportation 3 Credit(s).

Program Elective 2-3 Credit(s).

This is a suggested schedule for a student who has completed any developmental course work and has no transfer credits. Refer to the College catalog for specific requirements in selecting General Education Courses.

AVMT 221 - The Air Traffic Control System 3 Credit(s).

AVMT 231 - Instrument Pilot Ground School 4 Credit(s).

AVMT 253 - Unmanned Aircraft Systems Flight Training II 3 Credit(s).

AVMT 254 - Unmanned Aircraft Systems Sensor Operations 3 Credit(s).

Program Elective 2-3 Credit(s).

This is a suggested schedule for a student who has completed any developmental course work and has no transfer credits. Refer to the College catalog for specific requirements in selecting General Education Courses.

CMNS 101 - Fundamentals of Communication 3 Credit(s).

ERSC 131 - Introduction to Meteorology 4 Credit(s).

AVMT 216 - Aviation Safety 3 Credit(s).

AVMT 226 - Air Traffic Control Operations I 3 Credit(s).

Program Elective 2-3 Credit(s).

This is a suggested schedule for a student who has completed any developmental course work and has no transfer credits. Refer to the College catalog for specific requirements in selecting General Education Courses.

Gen. Ed. Elective - Social and Behavioral Sciences 3 Credit(s).

Program Elective (if required for a total of 14 elective credits) 2-3 Credit(s).
